divs: sighting detailswent to let the dogs out this morning and there was a triangle shaped object with 3 red lights underneath it flying from south to north above the tree line. you could see that it was an equilateral object. it made a noise but not like a hum and not like a plane that would fly overhead on it's way to sea-tac airport. it was flying above the trees and my big dog and i watched it fly behind my neighbors trees going north. holding my thumb out at a 45 degree angle, the object was bigger than my thumb. it is currently 59 degrees out, clear, warm and it was light out. i did take pictures of the sky afterwards with my phone (i retrieved this after sighting) showing the weather condition right after the sighting. i have also reported this sighting to the national ufo reporting center on 07\02\13 at 5:10am
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Tacoma
There was one other sighting in Tacoma on or around July 2nd 2013
